entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Re-enable Microsoft.DotNet.Watcher.Tests.GlobbingAppTests.RenameCompiledFile #42921
  • Tracking issue for unwinding changes made during net10 transition #42920
  • SDK 8.0.401: `dotnet workload install wasm-tools ` does not install correctly #42919
  • Detect and suggest updating dotnet global tools #42917
  • After installing .NET SDK 9.0 RC1, creating 8.0/6.0 project requires September Servicing (8.0.9/6.0.34) feeds. #42888

Closed

  • With Workload sets, upgrading the SDK feature band doesn't recognize the previously installed workload set #42502
    9.0.2xx
  • Razer escape @@ results in build error since SDK 8.0.400 #42730

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable fingerprinting in the VanillaWasm test #42918
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update ChoiceTemplateParameter.cs #42911
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove runtimes 5.0 and below #42889
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the .NET 9 build table #42883
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update Azure Linux tag names #42922
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Enable tab-completion for nuget package versions #42777
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Backport of auditSources fix #42800
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Handle Execution ID in dotnet test #42863
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Enable public builds for all 9.0 branches #42875
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Clean up some code #42775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Alpha Branding #42743
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Exclude Directory.Build.rsp from .gitignore template #42401
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, needs team triage, 10.0.1xx
  • Remove the install of all runtimes 5.0 and below. #42327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Stop using IReadOnlyList when it's always single #42866
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Add code to containers check to allow users to silence it #42501
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Remove longstanding comment from C# console template #42497
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Extend `dotnet run` to invoke a run-command-producing Target #42240
  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    Area-Tools
  • Workload set garbage collection #42475
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add RemoveJsonPropertyPostAction for symmetry with AddJsonPropertyPos… #42836
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-preview.7.24407.1 August 2024 Updates #42699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • NET tool roll forward error experience #38210
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Revert disabling the toolset package in Helix #42860
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42739
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Create a transport package for VS and VS authoring for analyzers #42451
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable BundleNativeAotCompiler for riscv64 architecture #42158
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #42807
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Update the loc build to target 9.0.1xx #42746
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
